english: Evidence is adduced by the procurator fiscal .
chinese: 证据由地方检察官提出。

english: The censors let out not a word .
The da decides to charge him as a habitual criminal .
chinese: 地方检察官决定以惯犯对他进行起诉。

english: I wish the honorable district attorney would mind his own business !
chinese: 我希望区检察官阁下管好自己的事情！

english: The d.a. has been under pressure to get the case settled and keep the yale name under wraps .
chinese: 已经有人向地方检察官施加压力，要他了结这桩案子，并且为耶尔的名字保密。
检察官造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The attack on this defendant, by the district attorney, seemed too unfair and uncalled-for, that was all .
chinese: 区检察官对这位被告的攻击似乎太不公正，太无道理，我的话完了。

english: Not because i'm looking for an office of any kind but because i am now the district attorney and it is my duty to do so .
chinese: 这并不是我要谋求什么公职，而是因为我现在是区检察官，有责任这么做。

english: If anybody but a negro boy were charged with murder, the state's attorney would not have rushed this case to trial and demanded the death penalty .
chinese: 如果受到杀人控诉的不是一个黑人孩子而是别的什么人，本州的检察官就不会这样急急忙忙把本案提交审判，并要求判处死刑。

english: Give me a call tomorrow , i ' ll run it by the da
chinese: 明天给我电话,我会让检察官去处理

english: I mean m . de villefort , the king s attorney .
chinese: 他就是维尔福先生，那位检察官。 ”

english: Please call your first witness , mr . prosecutor
chinese: 检察官先生，请传你的第一位证人。

english: " and this king s attorney was named villefort ?
chinese: “这位检察官的名字叫维尔福？ ”

english: A special prosecutor is investigating the case
chinese: 一位独立检察官正在调查这件案子。

english: Exclaimed the procureur , with a haggard expression
chinese: 检察官带着惊呆的神情喊道。
